key_findings: Heatmap is ONLY ranker with 100% positive years (6/6)
Heatmap has 57% better Return/DD ratio than 2nd place (Composite)
Heatmap has 36% lower drawdown than Composite (51.94% vs 88.28%)
2021 was the defining year - only Heatmap stayed positive (+277%)
Composite and Volatility had catastrophic losing years (-47%, -76%)
recommendations: Use Heatmap ranker for PlanAlpha strategy
Add cooldown period (10-20 days) to reduce 52% drawdown
Test with reduced maxPositions (5-7) for lower exposure
Test with less aggressive entry strategies (PlanEtf)
